content: these olallie legwarmers are what you ll reach for when you need a bit of warmth on a crisp cool morning out on the trail or while watching a sunset at the end of the day at your campsite versatile and cozy we knit ours using fancy tiger s heirloom romney 100% american romney wool offered in a short and a long version you will want to knit more than one pair size / dimensions legwarmers adult sizes s l shown in size s ankle circumference 8 75 9 5 in / 22 24 cm calf circumference 11 11 5 in / 27 5 29 5 cm height 17 25 in / 44 cm gaiters adult sizes s l shown in size s circumference 8 75 9 5 in / 22 24 cm height 8 75 in / 22 cm yarn legwarmers approximately 366 395 yd / 335 361 m worsted weight yarn shown in fancy tiger crafts heirloom romney 100% wool 200 yd / 183 m per 112g skein color dark natural 2 2 skeins gaiters approximately 173 187 yd / 158 171 m worsted weight yarn shown in fancy tiger crafts heirloom romney 100% wool 200 yd / 183 m per 112g skein color natural 1 1 skein gauge 16 sts / 38 rounds = 4 in / 10 cm in stockinette stitch worked in the round with size b needle after blocking needles needle sizes are recommendations only always use needle size necessary to achieve given gauge size a us #6 / 4 0 mm - dpns or circular needles for magic loop method or preferred small-circumference method size b us #8 / 5 0 mm - dpns or circular needles for magic loop method or preferred small-circumference method notions stitch marker tapestry needle
